title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.5 - Multiple vehicle registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.5 - Multiple vehicle registration

State Regulations

State employees owning more than one vehicle or
operating an assigned State vehicle will be allowed to register all vehicle
license numbers for their parking permit at OGS paid parking facilities. Only
one vehicle will be allowed entrance by means of the permit on any given day. Registered employee permit holders must properly affix and display and issued
tag/decal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
296-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
